sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'; export default function Prompts(props) { const fileInputRef = useRef(null); const iframeContainerRef = useRef(null); const handleFileUpload = () => { const file = fileInputRef.current.files[0]; const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); const iframe = document.createElement('iframe'); iframe.src = url; iframe.width = '100%'; iframe.height = '500px'; iframeContainer.innerHTML = ''; iframeContainerRef.current.appendChild(iframe); }; return (

{props.title}

Your resume is essential in your job applications. Answer these questions to find out if you have everything you need on it!

List of Prompts:

Have you ever had a dream that felt like it came true in real life? If you could live in any era throughout history, which one would you choose and why? What's the craziest adventure you've ever been on? If you could only eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be? What's the most interesting thing you've ever witnessed in public? If you could swap lives with any person for a week, who would you choose and why? If you could have dinner with any historical figure, who would it be and why? What's the most meaningful gift you've ever received? What's something you've always wanted to learn or try but haven't yet? What's the best concert or live performance you've ever attended? What's something you've always wanted to do but haven't had the opportunity yet? What's the most interesting place you've ever visited and why was it memorable? What's the best piece of advice you've ever received? What's the most challenging thing you've ever done and how did you overcome it? Do you have a favorite childhood toy or keepsake? If so, what is it and why is it special to you? What's your favorite way to celebrate special occasions? What's your favorite childhood book or movie and why? What's your favorite thing about yourself and why? What's your dream job or career? If you could have any animal as a pet, what would it be and why? What's your favorite way to relax or de-stress after a long day? Do you have any favorite traditions or memories? What's your favorite way to pamper or treat yourself? If you could have a conversation with your younger self, what advice would you give? What's a small act of kindness that someone has done for you that you still remember to this day? What's something that you're passionate about that not many people know about? What's something that always puts a smile on your face? Do you have any favorite quotes from books, movies, or speeches? How do you handle stress or difficult situations? What is your favorite outfit? What is your favorite dessert? Have you ever had a near-death experience? If so, what was it like? Where is your favorite place to travel? Do you have a favorite quote or mantra that you live by? What's your favorite type of snack? Do you prefer city life or rural living, and why? What's the most valuable lesson you've learned from a mistake or failure? What's your favorite way to relax and unwind? If you could have any animal as a pet, what would it be and why? Do you enjoy sports, and if so, which ones? What is your favorite personality trait about your significant other? What's something that always puts a smile on your face? What's the best gift you've ever given to someone? Tell me about your relationship with your siblings growing up? Who was your favorite? If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why? If you could swap lives with any person for a week, who would you choose and why? Do you have any hobbies or special talents? Do you have any phobias or fears? Do you have a favorite childhood game or activity? What's your favorite way to spend a lazy day? Who has been the most influential/ inspirational person in your life? Do you have a favorite musical artist or band? If so, who are they and why do you like them?

Need help finishing your resume? Here is a resume template:

Find more resume templates here from the University of Washington!

); }
